snippet: Brittany Smith, 24, pleaded guilty to hiding the gun used in the killing of a Cambridge man and helping three men involved.
lead_paragraph: Brittany Smith, 24, pleaded guilty to hiding the gun used in the killing of a Cambridge man and helping three men involved.

headline.main: Former Harvard Student Is Sentenced in Fatal Shooting
headline.print_headline: Former Harvard Student Is Sentenced in Fatal Shooting
headline.seo: Former Harvard Student Gets Prison Term in Fatal Shooting
